com.ca.mas.foundation

Class MASClaimsBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ca.mas.foundation.MASClaimsBuilder

  • public class MASClaimsBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder to construct MASClaims objects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MASClaimsBuilder()
      Initialize a builder object.
      MASClaimsBuilder(MASClaims masClaims)
      Initialize a builder object with an existing MASClaims object.
